ABOUT THIS APP:

Toon illustration:\nFree vector image, manipulated and animated by pernillaTherese.\nOriginal creator: vecteezy.com

Guess the letters for the word.
Every time the guessed letter matches with a letter in the correct word, it will replace the dashes in the hint word on all places where it occurs.
If the word does not contain the suggested letter, a bit of an image will be drawn.
After 10 incorrect guesses the image will be complete and you have lost.
If you guess all correct letters and make the correct word before the image is complete, you have won the game and saved the poor man from being hanged.
